caption: Metric
description: The Metric object defines a simple name/value pair entity for a metric.
name: metric

uid.description: The unique identifier of the metric being reported, used to maintain the state of the reporting system for cumulative or delta type metrics.

type.caption: Metric Type
type.description: The metric type, as defined by the metric_type_id.

type_id.caption: Metric Type
type_id.description: The normalized identifier of the metric type.

2.caption: db_client_connection_count
2.description: Total count of database client connections.

3.caption: db_client_connection_idle_max
3.description: Maximum idle time for database client connections.

4.caption: db_client_connection_idle_min
4.description: Minimum idle time for database client connections.

6.caption: db_client_connection_pending_requests
6.description: Pending requests waiting for a database connection.

7.caption: db_client_connection_timeouts
7.description: Count of connection timeouts for the database client.

8.caption: db_client_connection_create_time
8.description: Time taken to create a new database client connection.

9.caption: db_client_connection_wait_time
9.description: Wait time for establishing a database connection.

10.caption: db_client_connection_use_time
10.description: Duration for which the database connection is in use.

14.caption: faas_errors
14.description: Number of errors in FaaS invocations.

16.caption: faas_timeouts
16.description: Count of timeouts in FaaS invocations.

21.caption: http_server_active_requests
21.description: Count of active HTTP server requests.

22.caption: http_server_request_body_size
22.description: Body size of HTTP server requests.

23.caption: http_server_response_body_size
23.description: Body size of HTTP server responses.

25.caption: http_client_request_body_size
25.description: Body size of HTTP client requests.

26.caption: http_client_response_body_size
26.description: Body size of HTTP client responses.

31.caption: messaging_client_sent_messages
31.description: Count of messages sent by messaging clients.

32.caption: messaging_client_consumed_messages
32.description: Count of messages consumed by messaging clients.

35.caption: rpc_server_request_size
35.description: Size of requests sent to the RPC server.

36.caption: rpc_server_response_size
36.description: Size of responses sent by the RPC server.

37.caption: rpc_server_requests_per_rpc
37.description: Number of requests processed per RPC.

38.caption: rpc_server_responses_per_rpc
38.description: Number of responses generated per RPC.

40.caption: rpc_client_request_size
40.description: Size of requests sent by the RPC client.

41.caption: rpc_client_response_size
41.description: Size of responses received by the RPC client.

42.caption: rpc_client_requests_per_rpc
42.description: Number of requests sent per RPC by the client.

43.caption: rpc_client_responses_per_rpc
43.description: Number of responses received per RPC by the client.

44.caption: system_cpu_time
44.description: Total CPU time used by the system.

45.caption: system_cpu_utilization
45.description: Percentage of CPU utilized in the system.

46.caption: system_cpu_physical_count
46.description: Number of physical CPU cores in the system.

47.caption: system_cpu_logical_count
47.description: Number of logical CPU cores in the system.

49.caption: system_memory_usage
49.description: Total memory usage in the system.

50.caption: system_memory_limit
50.description: Total memory limit for the system.

51.caption: system_memory_shared
51.description: Amount of shared memory in the system.

52.caption: system_memory_utilization
52.description: Percentage of memory utilization in the system.

53.caption: system_paging_usage
53.description: Amount of paging memory currently in use.

55.caption: system_paging_faults
55.description: Count of paging faults in the system.

57.caption: system_disk_io
57.description: Total disk I/O operations in the system.

58.caption: system_disk_operations
58.description: Count of operations performed on the disk.

59.caption: system_disk_io_time
59.description: Total time spent on disk I/O operations.

62.caption: system_disk_limit
62.description: Disk space limit in the system.

67.caption: system_network_packets
67.description: Count of network packets sent and received.

68.caption: system_network_errors
68.description: Count of errors in network transmissions.

73.caption: system_linux_memory_available
73.description: Amount of available memory in Linux.

74.caption: system_linux_memory_slab_usage
74.description: Usage of slab memory in Linux.

78.caption: hw_disk_controller
78.description: Information about the disk controller hardware.

86.caption: hw_power_supply
86.description: Status of the hardware power supply.

87.caption: hw_tape_drive
87.description: Status of the hardware tape drive.

90.caption: process_cpu_time
90.description: Total CPU time used by the process.

91.caption: process_cpu_utilization
91.description: CPU utilization percentage for the process.

93.caption: process_memory_virtual
93.description: Virtual memory usage by the process.

94.caption: process_disk_io
94.description: Disk I/O operations performed by the process.

95.caption: process_network_io
95.description: Network I/O operations performed by the process.

96.caption: process_thread_count
96.description: Count of threads in the process.

97.caption: process_open_file_descriptor_count
97.description: Count of open file descriptors for the process.

98.caption: process_context_switches
98.description: Count of context switches for the process.

99.caption: Other
99.description: The logon type is not mapped.

100.caption: process_paging_faults
100.description: Count of paging faults for the process.
